location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP TO ACCOMPANY MR BADGER'S PAPER ON THE POLITICAL GEOGRAPHY OF MEKRAN, &c.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 195 x 302mm, on sheet 235 x 390mm

mods.abstract: The map shows Mekran [Makran] and the surrounding region, which includes the Persian Gulf and Beluchistan [Baluchistan]. It is used to accompany George Percy Badger's memorandum on the political geography of Mekran, and is colour coded to demarcate territory.
